Title: Gold Standard Project Based Learning: Project Based Teaching
Description:
After much research, Suzie Boss shares what makes excellent project-based teaching and gives a sneak peek into her book by the same name.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e384

Today's sponsor is Projectpals.com, a fantastic platform for students to plan, create, and manage their own projects (and for teachers to coach.) Learn more at projectpals.com.
